body: icc's [svml](https://software.intel.com/en-us/node/524289) has a lot of these functions, which we use (the excellent) [sleef](https://github.com/shibatch/sleef/) for instead. Unfortunately it's not open source or available like MKL. Thank you for reviewing and pointing this out however.
body_html: icc's svml has a lot of these functions, which we use (the excellent) sleef for instead. Unfortunately it's not open source or available like MKL. Thank you for reviewing and pointing this out however.
